datafield.subfield: Special issues include: "First annual convention of the Iowa District Young People's Luther League and Choral Union," issued Aug. 14, 1919; "Silver anniversary edition" commemorating Paul Olson's 25 years as publisher, issued Oct. 2, 1930; "Anniversary number" commemorating Paul Olson's 30 years as publisher and covering local events of the previous 30 years, issued Oct. 3, 1935; Story City's centennial edition, issued June 23, 1955; "Story City's progress edition," issued Oct. 29, 1975, and "Story City Herald 100th anniversary edition," issued Oct. 28, 1981.

Publishers: Jas. B. Hedge, Aug. 13, 1897-<May 5, 1899>, A.K. Grafton, <Jan. 11, 1901>-Mar. 14, 1902; Grafton Bros., Mar. 21, 1902-Sept. 28, 1905; Paul A. Olson, Oct. 5, 1905-Dec. 30, 1937; Paul A. Olson and Sons, Jan. 6, 1938-June 7, 1945; Paul A. Olson and Son, June 14, 1945-1954; Arthur E. Olson, 1954-1966; Marvin and Adeline Brown, 1966-Feb. 1973; Richard J. and Eloise Thorson, Feb. 1973-Sept, 1975; Eloise Thorson, Sept. 1975-
Issues for Oct. 3-10, 1935, published in tabloid form measuring 38 cm.
Editors: W.A. Kelley, 1892-July 30, 1897; Jas. B. Hedge, Aug. 6, 1897-<May 5, 1899>; Paul A. Olson, <Jan. 5, 1933-Dec. 30, 1937>.
Sixtieth year, no. 22 (June 1, 1950) lacks numbering within the volume.
Special supplements include: "Anniversary number; a quintuplet celebration," issued Oct. 24, 1940, and "Panorama of forty three years as country editor," issued Apr. 8, 1948.
